How do you deal with closure of school and / or childcare because of the coronavirus?
caption:
Starting on March 20th, all schools and kindergartens were closed.
There is emergency child care provided by the state in case parents work in essential professions (e.g., healthcare worker, positions necessary in meeting operational needs). Otherwise, families have had to rely on friends and/or close relatives for the childcare.
